title: Use of Omega-3 Fat Emulsion (Omegaven) in Infants With Parenteral Nutrition Associated Liver Disease

operands.value: Infants in the newborn intensive care unit
TPN cholestasis of at least 2.5 mg/dl
Anticipated TPN treatment for at least one month
Must have maximum age of 24 Months

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Anticipated TPN treatment for at least one month'), Symbol('Infants in the newborn intensive care unit'), Symbol('Must have maximum age of 24 Months'), Symbol('TPN cholestasis of at least 2.5 mg/dl'), Symbol('signed informed consent'), Not(Or(Symbol('Enrollment in another trial'), Symbol('Lack of consent'))))
